title: Quick and Easy Buffalo Chicken Dip
description: Whether it's game day or every day, you'll want to dip everything in this super quick, 4-ingredient Buffalo chicken dip featuring Tyson® Pulled Chicken Breast.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Trusted Brands: Recipes and Tips Quick and Easy Buffalo Chicken Dip 4.8 (26) 21 Reviews 13 Photos Game time. Snack time. All the time. Creamy, spicy, and oh-so-tasty, you'll find excuses to dip everything in it. Submitted by Tyson Chicken Updated on January 14, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 13 13 13 13 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 20 Yield: 20 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 20 servings 1 (20 ounce) bag Tyson Grilled & Ready® Pulled Chicken Breast, thawed 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened 1 cup sour cream ½ cup Buffalo sauce 1 (12 ounce) package tortilla chips Directions Combine the cream cheese, sour cream, and Buffalo sauce in a mixing or microwave-safe bowl. Fold in the pulled chicken once thawed, and serve cold or microwave on high for 2 minutes, stirring until the dip is heated throughout. Serve alongside your favorite tortilla chips. I Made It Print 61 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 192 Calories 12g Fat 13g Carbs 9g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 20 Calories 192 % Daily Value * Total Fat 12g 15% Saturated Fat 5g 24% Cholesterol 35mg 12% Sodium 508mg 22% Total Carbohydrate 13g 5% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Total Sugars 0g Protein 9g 19% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 52mg 4% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 66mg 1% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Add Your Photo Photos of Quick and Easy Buffalo Chicken Dip 01 of 13 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 13 Photo by  Chef Roy 09/02/2018 This is an amazing recipe! 03 of 13 Photo by  Derbakermom 09/01/2018 Super easy and quick. Great recipe go-to when you need something to bring to a pot-luck or party or just when friends drop in. Try adding blue cheese or putting the dip under the broiler for a few minutes! 04 of 13 Photo by  Paula 08/30/2018 This is such a quick and easy dip! Tasty too. I couldn’t find the Tyson shredded chicken, so I used the grilled strips and cut them as finely as possible. I used Frank’s Buffalo Sauce. Dinner was on the table tonight in less than 30 minutes! 05 of 13 Photo by  Paula 08/30/2018 This is such a quick and easy dip! Tasty too. I couldn’t find the Tyson shredded chicken, so I used the grilled strips and cut them as finely as possible. I used Frank’s Buffalo Sauce. Dinner was on the table tonight in less than 30 minutes! 06 of 13 Photo by  B Tario 08/30/2018 This dip was fast and easy to make and a big hit with not only my family but also with coworkers. This is perfect for parties or just any occasion. I will definitely make this again. 07 of 13 Photo by  Carol Castellucci Miller 08/29/2018 My family doesn’t like spicy food so I used half the amount of hot sauce. If you don’t care for hot food I would suggest you add 1/8 cup and taste it before adding more. The dip is, as it’s title suggests “ quick and easy.” It tastes good too. I can see adding a bag of frozen cauliflower to this and baking it and serving it as an entree. 08 of 13 Photo by  Chef Mo 08/28/2018 Very quick and easy! I pan thawed my chicken and that heat helped melt together my cream cheese, etc. All the guests at the party ate this up. It goes a long ways, so great for a crowd! 09 of 13 Photo by  Jenny Aleman de Bolaos 08/28/2018 We loved this dip!!! Easy and very tasty. We had it cold with tortilla chips, carrots and celery. The chicken was very tasty and very practical for quick recipes. I'm making it again. 10 of 13 Photo by  Staci 08/27/2018 So Yummy! I’ve made similar recipes in the past, but it doesn’t get any easier than this! 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Skillet Chicken & Riced Cauliflower 22 Ratings Johnsonville Flame Grilled Teriyaki Chicken Pizza 2 Ratings Party in Yo' Mouth 10-Minute Pressure Cooker Jerk Chicken Breasts Cream Cheese, Garlic, and Chive Stuffed Chicken 244 Ratings Instant Pot Cream Cheese Chicken Chili 3 Ratings Creamy Chicken Cordon Bleu Casserole 250 Ratings Enchanted Sour Cream Chicken Enchiladas 235 Ratings Slow Cooked Chipotle Chicken 50 Ratings Creamy Chipotle Chicken 296 Ratings Easy Parmesan-Crusted Chicken 292 Ratings Chicken Breasts in Dill-Caper Cream Sauce 40 Ratings Spinach and Cream Cheese Stuffed Chicken Breast 6 Ratings Pecan Chicken Breasts Stuffed with Cream Cheese and Broccoli 107 Ratings Rosemary Chicken Couscous Salad 87 Ratings Keto Chicken Parmesan 165 Ratings Keto Spinach-Artichoke Chicken 63 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Tyson Chicken
instructions: Combine the cream cheese, sour cream, and Buffalo sauce in a mixing or microwave-safe bowl.;Fold in the pulled chicken once thawed, and serve cold or microwave on high for 2 minutes, stirring until the dip is heated throughout.;Serve alongside your favorite tortilla chips.
